summary: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|Josh Hartnett|Kathryn Morris|Dakota Goyo|Alan Alda|Rachel Nichols|Teri Hatcher|Kristen Shaw|Nick Sandow|David Paymer|Harry Lennix|Peter Coyote|Ryan McDonald|Chris Ippolito|Jameson Trenholm|Stephen Strachan|Eugene Clark|Lori Ravensborg|J. title: El último asalto
